mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.user_name AS "userName", a.activityid AS "activityid", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.information AS "information", a.note AS "note", a.status AS "status", a.price AS "price", a.registration_time AS "registrationTime", a.attendance_time AS "attendanceTime", a.lottery_time AS "lotteryTime", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO con_user_activity( user_id, user_name, activityid, mobile, information, note, status, price, registration_time, attendance_time, lottery_time ) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{userName}, #{activityid}, #{mobile}, #{information}, #{note}, #{status}, #{price}, #{registrationTime}, #{attendanceTime}, #{lotteryTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE con_user_activity SET user_id = #{user.id}, user_name = #{userName}, activityid = #{activityid}, mobile = #{mobile}, information = #{information}, note = #{note}, status = #{status}, price = #{price}, registration_time = #{registrationTime}, attendance_time = #{attendanceTime}, lottery_time = #{lotteryTime} WHERE id = #{id}
